characters: Of course you bear the responsibility
So I can keep going to school
Did you see what the C girl was wearing
But what are you talking about
She was fucking about to bite Eric to death

dialogue.text: Your friend is doing as well as can be expected.
He needs to sober up and get a tetanus shot.
But if the bite had been a little higher on the neck,
we would have had a completely different situation.
This could have gotten a lot worse.
Thanks. –I’m out. Call if anything.
dialogue.speaker: Okay

dialogue.text: Alfred, wait!
–Come on now, guys!
dialogue.speaker: Talk later

dialogue.text: There’s both alcohol and minors inside your premises, and cold-bloods.
–It’s just a party.
dialogue.speaker: Of course you bear the responsibility

dialogue.text: We can’t take responsibility for what everyone else does.
Haven’t we had this conversation before?
Yeah, that’s exactly the point.
I don’t want any more shit from either of you. Is that understood?
–Mm… –Yes.
Cause we are young, wild, we are free
BST!
It's just the way that it's supposed to be
BST!
What the fuck…
Vampires can fucking go to hell! And you can’t trust them.
And vamp is just as dangerous as vampires. Shut up!
–What the hell, Alfred…
dialogue.speaker: She was fucking about to bite Eric to death

dialogue.text: Kiara, who I thought I was in love with, you can’t trust her.
All she cares about is status and dancing.
Who the fuck cares about dancing? It’s so fucking lame.
Batgirls can go to hell.
I’m logging out.
Look! Have you seen the video of Alfred?
–Yeah, the whole team is talking about it. –Send it to me.
–Oh my god! –What?
–Yeah, but look! –What then?
Look, what an idiot!
What a fucking loser.
–I mean, it’s completely insane. –Yeah, it’s completely insane.
–Yeah, United beat Liverpool.
dialogue.speaker: But what are you talking about

dialogue.text: Come on, that’s not what I mean.
Yes… We’ve spoken to the police and we’ve spoken to the principal.
You’ve lied to us, you’ve stolen
and you’ve blamed it on your brother.
You got triggered and bit a human.
But what’s worse, you’ve brought shame on our name.
We won’t be invited to the Blood-fest in Frankfurt next year.
And the dance!
You’ve broken vampire honor.
I’m nominated for Vampire of the Year. Am I supposed to stand on stage,
when my own daughter breaks all vampire laws and rules?
Do you understand how serious this is?
Look at me when I’m talking to you! You’ve risked everything.
Not just for us, but for all vampires.
The Blood System is going to file a child welfare report.
Here’s what we’re doing now.
No more hanging out with humans, especially no more dancing.
Straight home to and from school.
–We’ll see.
dialogue.speaker: So I can keep going to school

dialogue.text: The principal will decide tonight.
That’s all. You can go.
My parents were mega pissed. Worst interrogation all damn morning.
–I had Elise on the hook, you know. –What happened then?
I accidentally called her the wrong name.
I called her Elsa instead of Elise. She just left.
–Yeah.
dialogue.speaker: Did you see what the C girl was wearing

dialogue.text: –What? No.
dialogue.speaker: What

dialogue.text: No, thought so.
Will Eric turn into a vampire because he got bitten?
No, you’ve watched way too many movies.
Come to this year’s big event: the masquerade. Don’t forget to sign up today.
Or don’t. I don’t care.
No, damn it! Elise, sorry!
Typical! So fucking typical of me!
–Eric… –Yeah.
Can you come with me to my office for a moment?
Yeah, of course.
–So, how much anxiety do you have? –What?
I would have fled the country if I were you.
First your best friend makes out with your girl.
She’s not my girl.
Then the drunk clip of your vampire romance spreads all over school.
Or maybe even the whole municipality.
–Thanks, that really warms my heart. –Can’t you even sleep with a vampire?
–Do you even know what “sleep with” means? –I’m just asking. Want some?
But what happens to the balls if you sleep with a cold-blood?
They get completely cold, like when you swim in cold water?
If you swam in cold water
your dick would shrink to the size of a butterfly larva,
and then it flies away like a butterfly.
It’s all about technique.
Hello? Is there anyone here who wants vampires to be allowed at the masquerade?
No, no one wants to see a single vampire for the rest of the year.
Oh, is he a little grumpy?
That’s right, Alfred. Cute clip. Really sassy.
Ew!
What a fucking idiot Eric is, right?
Yeah, I know. But he’s okay.
But you could have died.
A crazy and completely fucking aggro vampire, you know.
Nah, I don’t know. Maybe it wasn’t that dangerous.
But she bit Eric, and all the parents know everything.
Dad’s going to take back his credit card.
Oh, poor you, Chloe!
Yeah, but screw that now.
I’ve found a new dancer for Batgirls: Kylie.
Kylie has several thousand followers on TikTok now.
Oh, okay. What happened to Adam or Siri?
Adam is still poor, and the glasses worm can’t be in.
–Yeah, you get it. Hello!
dialogue.speaker: What happened to Kiara then

dialogue.text: Bloodsuckers absolutely cannot be in.
Do you see who it is?
–Nah… Should I know? –Oh my god!
Today’s youth. Brain rot!
–It’s Elvis, Eric! –Oh, okay.
But try to keep up a little, Eric.
I’ve booked him for the masquerade.
I’ve done your job, you could say.
All you need to do is pay this Swish number.
–Got a good price, I’ll tell you. –Okay, thanks.
Am I done now?
Shit, right!
–She wasn’t going to get triggered, right? –No, it was pig blood.
–Oh my god! –Oops!
–Where’s Kiara? –She’s not allowed anymore.
Don’t screw this up now, Kylie, like the bloodsucker did.
A lot of people want your spot.
Okay, let’s go.
And five, six, seven, eight.
What are you doing? You’re not holding your position.
Sorry, I don’t know what I was thinking.
The masquerade is any day now. You need to level up.
–Yeah, okay, let’s go again. –Okay.
And five, six, seven, eight.
Break!
We’ll take two seconds.
–Chloe, you’ve changed the choreography. –No, I haven’t.
Okay. I’m out.
Out? Now? The masquerade is any day now.
I’m quitting. I’m dropping out.
What are you all staring at?
What are you waiting for? You get to take Elise’s spot now.
Some people are lucky today.
And five, six, seven, eight.
Nice blouse you’ve got. Sorry for what I did.
I bought flowers and milk chocolate,
but I forgot it. Damn it!
Sorry for behaving badly. I’m really sorry.
Elise, wait. Wait.
Nice chocolate you’ve got. I bought a blouse for you.
No, damn it. That came out wrong. I didn’t mean to…
…shove my tongue down Kiara’s throat
or make me feel completely worthless?
–I didn’t know… –Didn’t know what?
That I hate red roses?
–Eric, stop.
dialogue.speaker: I love you

dialogue.text: Stop trying to win me back. I can’t take it anymore.
Damn it! Elise, sorry!
Damn it!
Hell!
Okay, silence!
Thanks to everyone who could come here on such short notice.
You know why we’re here, so I’ll try to keep it short.
Okay. I also just want to remind everyone that this is an information meeting,
and it’s important that we keep a civil tone.
I mean, I know I’m not the only one who thinks this,
but how can you let this happen completely uncontrolled?
First of all, it’s not completely uncontrolled.
We follow all procedures and restrictions
completely according to all the Blood System’s recommendations.
Recommendations, you say?
How fun is it that our kids have to risk their lives
because someone in Stockholm decided they should go to the same school?
That’s not exactly how it is.
We all bear responsibility.
And cold-bloods are subject to the same compulsory schooling as all humans.
But what about me? I’ve got a worried boy at home.
He’s wondering what will happen with the masquerade
that he’s been looking forward to so much. Are vampires allowed at the ball now?
Can you then guarantee our children’s safety?
I’ve come to a decision, and it wasn’t easy, I’ll tell you.
I have decided that vampires, cold-bloods…
…are not welcome at this year’s masquerade.
Yes… Thank you.

characters: What do you mean not me too

dialogue.text: Yo. Need help, or?
No, I actually think I can make out on my own.
I don’t need your help with that.
Just a tip. Don’t choose my girl next time.
Please, not you too.
–Yeah, but you know how I am.
dialogue.speaker: What do you mean not me too

dialogue.text: Yeah, thanks.
–Everything?
dialogue.speaker: Everything turned to shit

dialogue.text: –Yeah, everything. –With Elise, you mean, or?
Yeah, not just that, but yeah, definitely with Elise.
–At Kiara’s party?
dialogue.speaker: What actually happened

dialogue.text: –What do you mean nothing?
dialogue.speaker: Nothing happened

dialogue.text: You know what I mean. –No, I don’t know what you mean.
dialogue.speaker: Come on

dialogue.text: Yeah, it didn’t work.
It? What do you mean “it”?
–You couldn’t get it up? –Yeah, I don’t know what happened.
I was probably nervous or something. I have no idea.
What the hell did you do then? What did she do?
–Panicked? You just bailed.
dialogue.speaker: I panicked

dialogue.text: –Yeah, and what was I supposed to do? –Why haven’t you said anything?
What was I supposed to say?
Hi, I’m Eric, and I couldn’t get it up.
–So that’s why you dissed her. –Yeah.
She can’t figure anything out. You really should talk to her.
No way! What do you think I’m trying to do, Affe?
–But admit you’re jealous. –Of what?
That I got bitten by a vampire and you didn’t.
–But you can’t become a vampire, right? –If you get bitten?
No. It’s pretty low risk.
Or low chance. Depends on how you look at it.
–Throw them straight on the fire.
dialogue.speaker: I brought one more anyway

dialogue.text: Come on! You don’t mean that. You have to talk to her too.
Vampires and humans don’t belong together.
She’s seen the clip, right?
Yeah! She may be traditional, but she’s got internet anyway.
Fuck that this clip went viral.
You get that I didn’t make out with Kiara on purpose, right?
Yeah, Elise said that. It’s not really Kiara’s fault either.
But I still made the right decision, right?
–Yeah, that I ditched her.
dialogue.speaker: With Kiara

dialogue.text: –We’re not hanging with her anymore. –What?
Who said that? Are you crazy or what?
Damn it! Damn it! Put out the fire, Eric.

characters: I heard what you said to Chloe

dialogue.text: It takes a lot of courage for you to show up here.
I know I’ve messed things up.
I know I’ve brought shame on your family.
Even though I learned everything about vampire honor
I still made Kiara break it.
I’m mostly sorry that I hurt your sister.
–I’m sorry. Is she home? –No.
Where is she then?
Do you seriously think I would tell you?
No, that’s true. I didn’t think so.
But just so you know, none of this is Kiara’s fault. Here.
–What did you say?
dialogue.speaker: You know where she is

dialogue.text: I said you’ve got ten seconds before I…
–Hi.
dialogue.speaker: Hi

dialogue.text: I’ve been thinking a bit, and the clip wasn’t meant to…
What?
I was sad. I’m sad.
I brought an invitation anyway.
–Said what?
dialogue.speaker: I heard what you said to Chloe

dialogue.text: What you said about vampires. That no one wants to see a fucking vampire anymore.
No one sees me anymore.
What was I supposed to say? I just wanted to get rid of her.
I was thinking anyway that I have two invitations
and I know you really want to go.
I know how much you’ve been looking forward to dancing.
I know I’m a dork and a nerd,
and that I’ve made a fool of myself.
But I’ve thought about vampires my whole life,
but none of my vampire fantasies can even come close to
what it’s like when I’m with you.
With you everything is real and not fantasy.
Before you continue, I want to say that I appreciate your honesty.
But I think you actually know that we don’t belong together.
So thank you so much for the invitation, but I have to say no.
Good decision. I’m probably going home anyway, so…
I’m a vampire and you’re a human.
We have two completely different ways of living. It’s too complicated.
I’m dangerous for you
and there’s a reason we should live separately.
We don’t belong together.
Good decision. Rules exist for a reason.
But not everything is just laws and rules.
There are feelings too. Fears, prejudices and love.
I know that you as a vampire are dangerous to me,
but you have to think about that you can hurt me in other ways.
You might not bite me to death so I die,
but I can die of a broken heart.
Sorry.
Subtitles: Iyuno for SVT
